div.div: The Atlantic Multidecadal Oscillation index and sea surface temperature values.
div.p: (A) Annual averages of the Atlantic Multidecadal Oscillation index. The vertical line indicates the beginning of the warm phase in 1995. (B) Annual averages of sea surface temperatures over the Texas shelf (SST TX), (C) Louisiana shelf (SST LA) and (D) west Florida shelf (SST FL). (E) Map of the SST regions, from left to right: SST TX, SST LA and SST FL.
